text:
I am addressing a screen reader issue, where thank you messages are not automatically read to the visitor. This would be resolved by adding a role=“dialogue” to the thank you message.

Because we cannot edit form thank you message source code, I am going to have to do this with javascript adding that role to divs with the “submitted-message” class. Not the end of the world.

Posting here though to see if this is something on HubSpot’s radar. Adding it to all portals would be a big help for all websites using HS forms.
